https://tmrev.io/movie/558815-A Christmas Village 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uejnp7Vcd4UV1IQWMZgPsm9UG4T.jpg Piper Jansen is a slick public relations genius and owner of her own company "Piper's Picks." After creating countless successful campaigns, she decides to use her grandmother's holiday recipes to write and launch a book of her own but, suddenly finds herself in the middle of a very public scandal that threatens the launch of the book as well as her business. A Christmas Village
